titles.title: A bill to continue the suspension of duty on certain antibiotic intermediates.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/15/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1990, the suspension of duty on (6R, 7R)-7-(R)-2-Amino-2-phenylacetamido -3-methyl-8-oxo-5-thia-1-azabicyclo (4.2.0) oct-2-ene-2-carboxylic acid disolvate.
